title: New: Twigs – Twigs EP
content:
I’ve spent most of this afternoon/evening lugging industrial lights across London, so it was with both joy and relief that I found this long awaited delight in my inbox.

Twigs has been compelling anyone who happens to be a fan of music for a little while now. Her first two tracks, Ache and Hide had something of Lykke Li about them, loosely, but enough to claim the attention of the masses. Perhaps now the comparison is unfair, as a full body of work the Twigs EP has more in common with Actress or Lukid than it does Li. The exterior is at times vulnerable, but at her core, Twigs is housing a while load of darkness.

Stream the EP below and after check out the video for each track.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
